articles.title: Greetings to FM of Nicaragua
articles.content:
Greetings to FM of Nicaragua
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho on Sept. 7 sent a message of greeting to Samuel Santos Lopez, foreign minister of Nicaragua, on the 195th anniversary of its independence. 
					 The message expressed belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger and wished him success in his work.

articles.title: Credentials to Romanian President
articles.content:
Credentials to Romanian President
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- Ri Pyong Du, DPRK ambassador to Romania, presented his credentials to Klaus Iohannis, president of Romania, on September 7.
					 The president said that he would develop the long-standing friendly relations with the DPRK in the common interests of the peoples of the two countries.

articles.title: DPRK FM Briefs Asian Diplomatic Envoys on Situation
articles.content:
DPRK FM Briefs Asian Diplomatic Envoys on Situation
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- The Foreign Ministry of the DPRK held a briefing on the situation for Asian diplomatic envoys here on Wednesday.
					 Present there were the Mongolian, Vietnamese, Lao, Indonesian and Indian ambassadors to the DPRK and the charges d'affaires ad interim of the Cambodian, Malaysian, Iranian and Pakistani embassies here.
					
					 Choe Hui Chol, director general of the Asian and Oceanian Department of the ministry, informed them of the principled stand of the DPRK on the recent nuclear warhead explosion test.
					
					 The test made it possible for the DPRK to produce various type smaller, lighter and diversified nuclear warheads with high striking power as many as it desires, he said, stressing that the U.S. outrageous nuclear threat and blackmail only compel the DPRK to bolster up  its nuclear attack capability hour by hour.
					
					 The DPRK will never lay down its nuclear weapons in the future, too but steadily bolster the state nuclear force both in quality and quantity to put a definite end to the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK, he noted.
					
					 He called upon Asian countries to properly understand the root cause of the tension on the Korean peninsula and thoroughly maintain impartiality and neutrality as regards the issue of the peninsula.
					
					 Then he informed them in detail of the flood damage in the northern part of North Hamgyong Province.
					
					 He told them that the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK government suspended all the important construction projects including the construction of Ryomyong Street and are directing all human, material and technical potentials to the campaign to recover from the flood damage in hearty response to the noble intention of Marshal Kim Jong Un that there is no more urgent emergency than alleviating the pain of the people and there is no more important revolutionary work than mitigating their misfortune.
					
					 He appealed to the Asian countries which have the long-standing friendly and cooperative relations with the DPRK to proactively cooperate in the work for recovering from the flood damage in the northern part of North Hamgyong Province.
					
					 The briefing provided the diplomatic envoys of Asian countries in the DPRK with an occasion of having a more correct understanding of the fact that the DPRK is bolstering up its nuclear force for self-defense to defend its sovereignty and vital rights and the right to development in order to cope with the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK and nuclear threat to it that have lasted for several decades.
					
					 The diplomatic envoys expressed deep sympathy with the huge human and material damage caused by flood in the DPRK and their willingness to recommend the governments of their countries to deal with the issue of offering emergency humanitarian aid in the shortest period and to work hard to realize it.

articles.title: Delegations, Delegates of Juche Idea Study Organizations Leave
articles.content:
Delegations, Delegates of Juche Idea Study Organizations Leave
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Mongolian Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea and the chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism left here for home on Wednesday after visiting the DPRK on its 68th founding anniversary.
					 Earlier, leaving here were a delegation of the German Group for the Study of Works of Comrade Kim Il Sung and Comrade Kim Jong Il, the chairman of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the chief of the Madrid Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Spain.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Mongolian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Mongolian President
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Tsakhiagiin Elbegdorj, president of Mongolia, on Sept. 8.
					 The message extended sincere and warm greetings to Kim Jong Un and, through him, to the freindly Korean people on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					
					 It expressed belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between Mongolia and the DPRK would grow stronger in the interests of the peoples of the two countries and for the regional peace and stability, development and prosperity.
					
					 It wished Kim Jong Un good health and happiness and the Korean people development and prosperity.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from President of Nepal

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from King of Thailand

Greetings to Kim Jong Un from King of Thailand

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Emir of Qatar

Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Emir of Qatar

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from President of Equatorial Guinea

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Angolan President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Angolan President

articles.title: Greeting to Kim Jong Un from Cameroonian President

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from President of Egypt

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from President of Guinea

articles.title: Army-Civilian Joint Rallies Held in South Phyongan Province, Nampho City
articles.content:
Army-Civilian Joint Rallies Held in South Phyongan Province, Nampho City
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- There took place army-civilian joint rallies in South Phyongan Province and Nampho City on Wednesday to celebrate the successful nuclear warhead explosion test.
					 Present there were officials of the party and power organs, working people's organizations, industrial establishments, farms and universities, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, people from all walks of life and youth and students in the province and city.
					
					 A statement released by the Nuclear Weapons Institute of the DPRK was read out to be followed by congratulatory speeches at the rallies.
					
					 The speakers said the successful warhead explosion test conducted to mark the founding anniversary of the DPRK was the greatest event which guaranteed eternal prosperity and security of Juche Korea and an exciting deed to go down in the national history that instilled confidence in sure victory and optimism into the servicepersons and people.
					
					 They noted that supreme leader Kim Jong Un victoriously led the nuclear warhead explosion test and put dignity and prestige of the DPRK on the highest stage.
					
					 They called upon all sectors and units to thoroughly implement the tasks advanced at the Seventh Congress of the Party and raise a fierce flame of creating the Mallima speed in recovering the flood-hit northern areas of North Hamgyong Province.
					
					 They underscored the need for the People's Army to annihilate the enemy at a strike if the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet forces dare ignite a war on this land.
					
					 Scientists and technologists should solve on the highest level the scientific and technological problems arising in developing the national defence industry and economic construction, they said.
					
					 They called upon the youth to continue to charge, advance and make innovations holding aloft the slogan "Let us fully demonstrate the resourcefulness and valor of the hero youth in the general offensive for building a powerful socialist country!"

articles.title: National Scientific and Technological Presentation in Field of Hydro-meteorology Held
articles.content:
National Scientific and Technological Presentation in Field of Hydro-meteorology Held
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- The national scientific and technological presentation in the field of hydro-meteorology took place at the State Hydro-meteorological Administration on Tuesday and Wednesday under the sponsorship of the Central Committee of the  General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea.
					 Present there were officials, teachers, researchers, forecasters and postgraduate students of various units including Kim Il Sung University, the State Hydro-meteorological Administration and provincial hydro-meteorological administrations.
					
					 The presentation was divided into meteorological and hydrological panels. Introduced there were more than 70 scientific and technical achievements gained in the work for ensuring the accuracy of weather forecast.
					
					 The participants swapped the experience they achieved in the course of putting the hydro-meteorological forecast on a high scientific and IT basis, rounding off observation networks as required by natural and geographical features of Korea and developing reality and updating meteorological observation equipment.
					
					 Also presented were papers for scientific and reasonable use of water resources for hydro-power generation and irrigation reservoirs.

articles.title: Many Tons of Iron and Steel Supplied to Flood-hit Areas
articles.content:
Many Tons of Iron and Steel Supplied to Flood-hit Areas
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- The DPRK's metal industrial sector steps up the iron and steel production for the smooth rehabilitation in the flood-stricken northern areas of North Hamgyong Province.
					 A brisk campaign for increased production was launched at Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex, Chollima Steel Complex and other metal industrial establishments of the country.
					
					 The Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex already supplied to the disaster areas more than 190 tons of iron and steel.
					
					 Meanwhile, Musan Mining Complex and Unryul and Jaeryong mines have boosted the output 1.2 times over the schedule to provide enough raw materials for the iron and steel production.
					
					 After all, several hundreds of tons of iron and steel were sent to the flood-afflicted areas in a few recent days.

articles.title: DPRK People Are Convinced of Victory in Reconstruction of Disaster areas
articles.content:
WPK's Politics Turning Misfortune into Blessing
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- There is no emergency for the Party than the pain of the people and no important revolutionary work is as crucial as alleviating their misfortune, according to an appealing call released by the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) a few days ago.
					 Upon receiving the appealing call, people in the DPRK are recalling those days when a miracle was wrought in Rason City.
					
					 In August 2015, downpour and flood hit Sonbong area of the city.
					
					 At that time, supreme leader Kim Jong Un convened an enlarged meeting of the Central Military Commission of the WPK, at which he issued an order of the supreme commander of the Korean People's Army to mobilize KPA units for completely restoring the flood-stricken Rason City before the founding anniversary of the Party.
					
					 In hearty response to the order, the soldier-builders had fully displayed the spirit of at a go in the campaign to heal the flood damage.
					
					 They finished the framing of over 1 300 houses in ten days. It took only 30-odd days for them to turn the area into a fairyland of socialism.
					
					 Thanks to the WPK's loving care for the people, new fascinating villages came into being in Sonbong area of Rason City and a sound of hurrah for the WPK, socialism and the army-people great unity reverberated far and wide.
					
					 Now, the northern areas of North Hamgyong Province was flooded by heavy rain, but the DPRK people are convinced of a victory in their reconstruction with their absolute trust in the WPK.

articles.title: Freight Traffic for Flood Damage Rehabilitation on Rapid Increase in DPRK
articles.content:
Freight Traffic for Flood Damage Rehabilitation on Rapid Increase in DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- A priority is given to the centralized railway transport for the flood-hit areas of North Hamgyong Province in the DPRK.
					 According to Han Yong Chol, department director of the Ministry of Railways, 7 500 tons of cargo including cement, rolled steel and fuel oil were carried by train to the disaster areas on Tuesday alone.
					
					 The ministry has striven to organize and control the transport services in a mobile way and thus raise the carrying capacity.
					
					 Various railway bureaus under it work hard to ensure the formation and departure of centralized transport trains without delay while considerably reducing their stoppage time.
					
					 The Chongjin Railway Bureau in North Hamgyong Province is concentrating its efforts on the reduction of unloading time.

articles.title: Korean Army and People All out for Flood Recovery Campaign in North Hamgyong Province
articles.content:
Korean Army and People All out for Flood Recovery Campaign in North Hamgyong Province
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- The army and people are all out in the flood recovery campaign in the northern areas of North Hamgyong Province.
					 Flood that swept the area from August 29 to September 2 was the biggest disaster since the liberation of Korea.
					
					 The River Tuman rapidly swelled due to the heaviest downpour in the history of meteorological observation in the country, inflicting horrible disaster on Hoeryong City, Musan County, Yonsa County, Onsong County, Kyongwon County, Kyonghung County and part of Rason City.
					
					 According to a data available, casualties number hundreds including missing persons and more than 68 900 people were displaced.
					
					 A total of over 29,800 dwelling houses were damaged including complete collapse of more than 11,600 and over 900 blocks of production and public buildings were destroyed or damaged.
					
					 Over 180 sections of roads and more than 60 bridges were seriously destroyed in the afflicted areas, shutting down the traffic. Railways sections went under silt in over 100 places and roadbeds were washed away, suspending train service.
					
					 Power substations were submerged or buried under silt and electricity transmission lines were cut off in Musan and Yonsa counties, suspending power supply. Equipment, dykes and waterways of several small and medium power stations were destroyed, cutting off communication.
					
					 More than 27,400 hectares of cultivated land were washed away or submerged and 150 dykes or rivers or streams and dykes and drainage canals were destroyed in Kyonghung and Kyongwon counties.
					
					 The flood damage in North Hamgyong Province caused huge disasters to the economic development and people's living in the province.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un set the flood recovery in the northern part as the main thrust and the foremost front of the 200-day campaign and made sure that measures were taken to conduct recovery campaign as the one involving the entire Party and society.
					
					 The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea put up the militant slogan "Let us achieve miraculous victory of turning misfortune into favorable conditions on the front of recovering from damage done to the northern areas of North Hamgyong Province with the great might of single-minded unity!"
					
					 The entire army and all people of the country are conducting a dynamic flood recovery campaign in hearty response to the call of the Party.

articles.title: Top Prize of World Circus Festival Conferred on DPRK Physical Acrobatics
articles.content:
Top Prize of World Circus Festival Conferred on DPRK Physical Acrobatics
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- The top prize of the world circus festival "Idol-2016" was awarded to the DPRK physical acrobatics "Diverse Trapeze Flight."
					 The festival which was held in Moscow from Sept. 8 to 11 brought together at least 200 famous acrobats from 15 countries including the DPRK, Russia, Mongolia, China, Canada, France, Azerbaijan, Iran and Spain.
					
					 The DPRK acrobats displayed high techniques and skills to be acclaimed by the spectators.
					
					 At the awarding ceremony the gold prize "Idol-2016", top prize of the festival, was conferred upon the physical acrobatics "Diverse Trapeze Flight."
					
					 Bronze prize went to the DPRK acrobatics "Handstand Etude."
					
					 Congratulating the Korean acrobats on the successful performance, the chairman of the festival jury said:
					
					 The DPRK holds world championship in aerial acrobatics.
					
					 Its aerial stunts are the best.

articles.title: DPRK Players Prove Successful at 2016 Asian Junior and Juvenile Judo Championship
articles.content:
DPRK Players Prove Successful at 2016 Asian Junior and Juvenile Judo Championship
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- DPRK players bagged two gold medals and a bronze medal at the 2016 Asian Junior and Juvenile Judo Championship.
					 The championship held in India from September 6 to 11 brought together at least 310 men and women players from the DPRK, China and Iran and 36 countries and the region.
					
					 O Son Hui and Ji Un Ha defeated all opponents in the junior women's 48 kg and 52 kg categories.
					
					 Jang Chong Il clinched a bronze medal in the junior men's 55kg category.
					
					 They returned home on Wednesday.

articles.title: World-famous Scholars Produced by Kim Il Sung University
articles.content:
World-famous Scholars Produced by Kim Il Sung University
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- The number of world-renowned scholars is increasing in the DPRK.
					 Among them is Dr. Im Song Jin of the Physical Faculty of Kim Il Sung University, whose paper "Nano plasmonic phase modulator" was carried in a magazine "Scientific Reports" of the British "Nature" Publishing Group in January this year.
					
					 His paper struck world scientists with amazement as it advanced a new conception of plasmonic phase modulation, quite different from the existing principle and method.
					
					 Im has so far presented scores of papers to 10-odd international academic seminars, with eight SCI international scientific treatises in 2015-2016. His paper "Progress in Nonlinear nano-optics" was also brought out in a booklet by Germany's "Springer Series".
					
					 According to Ri Sang Il, director of the nature science guidance department of Kim Il Sung University, told KCNA that the university has produced at least 20 world-famous scholars in recent years.
					
					 They include Dr. Jang Song Hun of the Life Science Faculty who registered in the GenBank 50 genes of goshawk, the national bird of the DPRK, and diverse fishes on behalf of the university, presented 15 papers to the SCI international scientific magazine and attended the international scientific seminars several times.
					
					 There are also Dr. Yu Chol Jun of the Material Science Faculty, and Dr. Kim Nam Chol of the Physical Faculty.
					
					 Yu Chol Jun was invited to be a member of the organizing committee for the Asia Advanced Materials Congress hosted by the IAAM in June this year and enrolled as a member of IAAM in July.
					
					 Kim Nam Chol blazed a new path to the quantum information field in the DPRK. He made a significant progress in researches into the development of single photon transistor and the optical properties of nano-particle systems and quantum state control.

articles.title: U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK Is Bound to Go Bankrupt: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK Is Bound to Go Bankrupt: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is making much fuss, pushing its allies to "announce a statement" and apply an "additional sanctions" at the UN over the successful nuclear explosion test for judging the power of nuclear warhead conducted by scientists and technicians of the DPRK Nuclear Weapons Institute, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an article.
					 The U.S. can never escape from the blame for pushing the DPRK to have access to nuclear weapons and should draw a due lesson from this, the article notes, adding anyone is not entitled to say this or that about the DPRK's nuclear deterrence for self-defense, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The DPRK has built all edifices startling the world people despite the harsh sanctions imposed by the U.S.-led imperialists. So, the DPRK's succeeding in strategic ballistic rocket, SLBM and nuclear explosion tests is a demonstration of its determination and will to settle accounts with the U.S. imperialists, the sworn enemy.
					
					 The U.S. persistent sanctions and pressure on the DPRK would only be a waste of time for it and the DPRK's capability of nuclear strike will immensely be bolstered as much.
					
					 The DPRK's Juche-based defense industry which has been consolidated for decades is fully prepared to cope with all wars wanted by the U.S.
					
					 The DPRK will in the future, too, continue taking measures for bolstering the state nuclear force in quality and in quantity to defend its dignity and vital rights and safeguard genuine peace from the U.S. ever- increasing nuclear war threat.
					
					 The U.S. anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK is bound to go bankrupt.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Will Be Made to Pay Dear Price for Her Crimes against National Reunification
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Will Be Made to Pay Dear Price for Her Crimes against National Reunification
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- The Park Geun Hye group of traitors committed such unpardonable anti-reunification crimes as turning down the joint principles and declarations adopted by the north and the south, while refusing dialogue and cooperation and escalating the confrontation with compatriots in the north, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an article.
					 The disastrous reality in which the north-south relations totally collapsed and the hope of fellow countrymen for national reunification is being dashed due to a handful of the group of traitors and the enemy of the nation, clearly proves what grave consequences the Park group's moves for confrontation with compatriots will entail, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The Park group is a herd of heinous traitors keen on escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 The south Korean puppet conservative group should never be pardoned as they are wrecking the inter-Korean relations and laying grave obstacles in the way of achieving national reunification through treacherous acts against fellow countrymen with the backing of foreign forces.
					
					 There is no place for sycophants and traitors to live on this land any longer as they are clinging to coattails of their U.S. master, pushing the inter-Korean relations to irretrievable and catastrophic phase and increasing the danger of a nuclear war.
					
					 The puppet conservative group should be sternly punished in the name of all the Koreans as it is going against the country and the nation and viciously obstructing the reunification of the country as a shock brigade for realizing the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Assails U.S. and S. Korean Puppet Force's Foolish Scenario for Preemptive Strike
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Assails U.S. and S. Korean Puppet Force's Foolish Scenario for Preemptive Strike
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- Shocked by the DPRK's nuclear warhead explosion test, the U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime are recklessly dreaming of mounting a preemptive attack on the DPRK.
					 After crying out for imposing high-profile sanctions upon the DPRK to cut its "windpipe", the U.S. let two B-1B nuclear strategic bombers fly over south Korea on Sept. 13 as part of its preparations for making a preemptive strike at the DPRK.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye regime, the war servant of the U.S., is running wild like rabid dogs. It made no scruple of blustering that they would reduce to ashes the north's leadership and make Pyongyang disappear on the map, disclosing even what they call "triad strike system" and "large-scale retaliatory operation plan."
					
					 Due to the worst provocations of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime watching for a chance of carrying out the above-said scenario, the touch-and-go situation is prevailing on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 All the fellow countrymen and the world are closely following the development on the peninsula and condemning those responsible for the instability.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces can never evade the responsibility for the tension on the peninsula.
					
					 It is they who compelled the DPRK to double efforts to finally round off its nuclear force at so high cost.
					
					 A series of measures taken by the DPRK in succession to bolster up its nuclear force were unavoidable and justifiable options made by the DPRK in order to defend the sovereignty and dignity of the country and the vital rights of the nation from the unprecedented political and economic pressure and military threats by the U.S. and its vassal forces.
					
					 The DPRK conducted the recent nuclear warhead explosion test, the highest phase of mounting nuclear warheads on ballistic rockets, because the moves of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime openly aiming at the "collapse of social system" and "eradication of leadership" have reached an intolerable phase.
					
					 The above-said hostile forces would be well advised to properly approach their rival whose position has dramatically changed.
					
					 At present, the DPRK has in place everything it desires and has gone through even the final process for rounding off the state nuclear force.
					
					 The DPRK is fully ready to mercilessly strike and wipe out to the last man anytime the outrageous provocateurs who have been hell-bent on ratcheting up sanctions against the DPRK, stifling and invading it for the last several decades.
					
					 The time is drawing near when our service personnel and civilians will punish the enemies.
					
					 If the enemies show even a slight sign of operations to impair the dignity and prestige of our state, the Korean People's Army will mount a decisive and strong preemptive nuclear attack on them.
					
					 It is the DPRK which will seize the golden chance of mercilessly striking the hostile forces and reunifying the country.
					
					 The warmongers had better awake from their daydream.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Terms Traitor Park Geun Hye's Invectives Symptoms of Doom
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Terms Traitor Park Geun Hye's Invectives Symptoms of Doom
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- Traitor Park Geun Hye of south Korea has reached the height in her reckless invectives against the DPRK, symptoms of her doom.
					 She is now busy recklessly wagging her tongue about "sign of serious crack in the north" and "contingency of concern" in a bid to escalate the confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north.
					
					 This is no more than the last-ditch effort of the doomed.
					
					 The Park regime is in the grip of the worst ruling crisis, cursed and denounced by the public for all sorts of crimes it committed against the people since its emergence.
					
					 Though she grabbed "presidency" by deceiving people under the signboard of "working hard for improving the people's living", she reneged on more than 200 "election" commitments, bringing the worst economic slump to south Korea and deteriorating the people's living. 
					
					 Consequently, south Korea's "state debt" reached 1,170 billion U.S. dollars, all-time high, at present while its enterprises and families are saddled with 1,180 billion and 1,200 billion U.S. dollars respectively.
					
					 Ruthless white terrorism and politically-motivated terror against pro-reunification democratic forces and undisguised allurement and abduction of inhabitants of the DPRK are sparking off criticism and condemnation among the Koreans and of the international community. This means the political and moral doom of the Park's group as human rights abusers.
					
					 She went so crazy with the confrontation with compatriots that she shut down the Kaesong Industrial Zone, fruition of the June 15 joint declaration and the last hope for keeping the north-south relations afloat, thus committing another high treason against the nation.
					
					 She left OPECON to the tender mercy of the U.S. and glossed over the crimes related to the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army. These sycophantic and treacherous acts hastened the total failure of her foreign policy.
					
					 Moreover, she consented to the deployment of THAAD in south Korea despite unanimous protest of the Koreans and peoples of regional countries. Now angry shouts protesting against the group of traitors and demanding the impeachment of Park are heard across south Korea. 
					
					 The DPRK's bolstering of its nuclear force is throwing the puppet regime into extreme horror and uneasiness as it is powerful enough to frustrate its American master's racket to stifle the DPRK and bring him to ruin in a moment.
					
					 For Park to talk about "contingency" in the north is as foolish an act as beating the air. 
					
					 Her desperate frenzy to seek a way out through such invectives would only precipitate her doomsday.

articles.title: U.S. B-1B Nuclear Strategic Bombers Fly over S. Korea
articles.content:
U.S. B-1B Nuclear Strategic Bombers Fly over S. Korea
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists are going reckless, taken aback by the DPRK's successful nuclear test.
					 After declaring their plan to massively introduce nuclear strategic assets including nuclear carriers and nuclear strategic bombers into the Korean peninsula, they perpetrated such military provocation as letting ill-famed two nuclear strategic bombers B-1Bs which had already been forward-deployed in Anderson Air Force Base on Guam fly over south Korea on Tuesday as the first phase.
					
					 They are blustering this is a "demonstration of fulfillment of their strong commitment to protecting" south Korea and "strong warning" to the DPRK, in particular. 
					
					 B-1B is the ill-famed nuclear war means of the U.S. imperialists for mounting a preemptive nuclear attack during their wars of overseas aggression.
					
					 They are bluffing that B-1Bs are enough for fighting an all-out nuclear war. 
					
					 It is an open secret that they forward-deployed these nuclear war means on Guam, their outpost for war against the DPRK, on August 6 a decade later. 
					
					 No sooner had the Ulji Freedom Guardian nuclear war drill come to a close than they resorted to nuclear threat and blackmail against the DPRK in succession over its legitimate nuclear warhead explosion test. This clearly indicates once again what reckless phase their brigandish scenario for invading the DPRK has reached.
					
					 Prompted by their sinister aim of branding all self-defensive measures taken by the DPRK to protect the sovereignty of the country and the nation's right to live as "provocations" and "threats" and finding a pretext for justifying their aggressive scenario, the U.S. imperialists keep letting their nuclear strategic bombers fly over south Korea in a bid to seek an opportunity of mounting a preemptive nuclear attack.
					
					 That is why they are going to introduce nuclear carriers and other nuclear strategic means to the Korean peninsula and its vicinity in succession.
					
					 These extremely reckless provocations of the U.S. imperialist warmongers are pushing the situation on the Korean peninsula to the point of explosion hour by hour.
					
					 The Korean People's Army, possessed of all means for military counteraction to beat back any aggression and provocation at a single blow, is sharply watching the reckless military moves of the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 They had better stop their rash actions.

articles.title: Projected Frantic Anti-DPRK Leaflet-scattering Operation under Fire
articles.content:
Projected Frantic Anti-DPRK Leaflet-scattering Operation under Fire
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- The whole planet is stunned by the news of the DPRK's successful nuclear warhead explosion test.
					 Horror-stricken by this news, the south Korean puppet forces are again resorting to a despicable psychological warfare.
					
					 They opened to media their plan to prod the wicked non-governmental reactionary organizations into scattering anti-DPRK leaflets with the Harvest Moon Day as an occasion.
					
					 According to it, more than 40 human scum including Pak Sang Hak, representative of the "Alliance for the Movement of Free North", are reported to send 300 000 leaflets "criticizing" the DPRK's nuclear test and slandering its socialist system and one-dollar notes to the north side by use of more than ten balloons from the "observation deck for unification on Mt. Odu" in Phaju City, Kyonggi Province.
					
					 Then they decided to hold a "joint sacrificial rite" to incite the confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north.
					
					 Pak Sang Hak, the human scum without an equal in the world, blustered that he is mulling scattering leaflets towards the north before holding the rite on the day, adding that although it is an annual event, it is quite different event because of the north's fifth nuclear test.
					
					 The above-said actions are nothing but the last-ditch efforts of the human scum to prolong their remaining days through the confrontation as they fled to ditch-like south Korea after betraying the benevolent country which brought them up and their parents, brothers and sisters.
					
					 The puppet regime, keen on antagonizing, distrusting and standing in confrontation with the fellow countrymen, has gone more reckless to use the folk holiday as an occasion of stoking confrontation by hurling the above-said human scum into the area north of the "civilian passage restriction line" after fixing the anti-DPRK smear campaign as a "state policy".
					
					 The units of the south Korean puppet army in the frontline areas are now heightening "firepower alert posture" and taking steps for provide military backing to those reactionary organizations' anti-DPRK leaflets scattering operation.
					
					 The puppet forces' moves to scatter anti-DPRK leaflets with the Harvest Moon Day as an occasion are aimed to impair the prestige of the DPRK markedly raised thanks to the great success in its nuclear warhead explosion test and, at the same time, rattle the nerves of the Korean People's Army and compel it to take retaliatory counteraction and then brand it as "provocation" and escalate tension in a bid to weather their most serious ruling crisis.
					
					 Their desperate efforts to do harm to the DPRK through such leaflets scattering operation are as foolish as trying to get the sun eclipsed with a palm.
					
					 Korean-style socialism which has taken its deep roots in the hearts of the popular masses is like a natural fortress standing invulnerable in the face of any tempest caused by the imperialists.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will never overlook the anti-DPRK psychological warfare such as despicable leaflet-scattering operation of the puppet forces.
					
					 It is as clear as noonday what fate the chieftains of the anti-DPRK leaflets-scattering operation and other psychological warfare conducted   under the eyes of the DPRK will face and what the sites of leaflets-scattering operation will look like.
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces should not forget even a moment that their persistent and despicable psychological smear campaign against the DPRK will only precipitate their self-destruction.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Forces Scheme to Suppress Actions against THAAD Deployment
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Forces Scheme to Suppress Actions against THAAD Deployment
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet group of traitors are going reckless to arrest the ever mounting actions for making the decision on THAAD deployment cancelled, according to the south Korean paper Media Today.
					 The North Kyongsang Provincial District Police Agency on August 31 announced a report on the results of training for harsh suppression of rallies and demonstrations against THAAD deployment in Songju and Kimchon.
					
					 The report dealt with the training for use of suppression tools to crack down on participants in rallies and demonstrations.
					
					 The puppet forces, upset by the ever mounting actions against THAAD deployment, are working to block actions from spreading across south Korea by mobilizing all power to suppress rallies and demonstrations.

articles.title: Largest-ever Quake Hits Kyongju City, S. Korea
articles.content:
Largest-ever Quake Hits Kyongju City, S. Korea
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- There was an earthquake measuring 5.8 on the Richter scale in Kyongju City, North Kyongsang Province, south Korea on Sept. 12, according to the south Korean KBS.
					 Earlier, quakes measuring 5.1 on the Richter scale occurred in North and South Kyongsang Provinces including Kyongju and Ulsan.
					
					 The epicenter was an inland area 8-9km west-south of Kyongju.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Censured for Insulting Victims of Sexual Slavery
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Censured for Insulting Victims of Sexual Slavery
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- Heard in south Korea are loud voices censuring Park Geun Hye for keeping mum about Japan's demand for the withdrawal of a girl statue after insulting the victims of sexual slavery through the humiliating "agreement", according to a south Korean internet paper.
					 Kim Pok Dong, a victim of sexual slavery, went to the "National Assembly" on September 8 to denounce traitor Park's crimes.
					
					 She said she will fight against Japan together with the people to defend the girl statue and wrest apology and reparation from Japan.
					
					 At the NA on September 8, the representative of the opposition Minju Party had an interview with the Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps and declared the "agreement" on the issue of sexual slavery null and void.
					
					 What all victims demand is the Japanese government's official apology, he said, adding his party will fight it out for the reinstatement of the victims.
					
					 At a NA meeting on the same day, the representative of the Jongui Party proposed all parties to form an ad hoc committee for probing the truth about the humiliating "agreement" on the issue of sexual slavery.

articles.title: Withdrawal of U.S. Forces from S. Korea Demanded
articles.content:
Withdrawal of U.S. Forces from S. Korea Demanded
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Minjok Ilbo in an editorial on September 12 called for putting an end to the history of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces' presence in south Korea.
					 71 years have passed since the U.S. forces' occupation of this land, the editorial said, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. has turned south Korea into a logistic base for invading the north, is staging nuclear war exercises against it and decided to deploy THAAD recently, rattling the north and neighboring countries and escalating tension in Northeast Asia.
					
					 The entire nation is demanding an end to the U.S. military presence in south Korea.
					
					 Those keen on the U.S. military presence are only the sycophants and traitors following the U.S. and anti-reunification forces including the Park Geun Hye regime which is prolonging its remaining days by taking advantage of the nation's division.
					
					 Korea was divided 71 years ago and has not yet been reunified which are all attributable to the U.S. military presence in south Korea.

articles.title: Drunken S. Korean Puppet Army Soldiers Commit Violence
articles.content:
Drunken S. Korean Puppet Army Soldiers Commit Violence
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- An officer of a unit of the south Korean puppet army in the central eastern front of the south Korean Kangwon Province drank wine on August 25 and stole other's car, according to the south Korean Newsis.
					 On September 10, a drunken sergeant of a unit of the army in the central eastern front also assaulted a passer-by for no reason.

articles.title: WPK and Korean People's Just Cause Supported in Portugal
articles.content:
WPK and Korean People's Just Cause Supported in Portugal
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- "A resolution supporting the struggle of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and Korean people for construction of socialist power and national reunification" was adopted on Sept. 4 at the meeting of foreign party delegations and delegates, members of the leadership of the Communist Party of Portugal and the delegation of officials of the WPK which took part at the 40th festival of the paper Avante, organ of the Communist Party of Portugal.
					 It said that Marshal Kim Jong Un was elected chairman of the WPK at its 7th Congress and he set forth the blueprint for successfully building a socialist power under the banner of modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and tasks for achieving independent reunification of the country and global independence.
					
					 The Korean people have turned out in the drive for implementing the tasks set forth at the 7th Congress of the WPK single-mindedly united around Kim Jong Un, it noted, and went on:
					
					 The heroic struggle and successes of the WPK and the Korean people in defending the country and hastening the building of a socialist power while shattering the persistent attempt of the U.S. and other hostile forces to apply sanctions against the DPRK and stifle it and their moves for a new war give great confidence and courage to the progressive parties and peoples who love justice and truth and aspire after socialism against imperialism.
					
					 We, taking part in the festival of Avante, organ of the Communist Party of Portugal, extend full support and solidarity to the heroic struggle of the WPK and the Korean people for building a socialist power and achieving national reunification.

articles.title: Korean Book, Stamp and Handicraft Exhibition Opens in Russia
articles.content:
Korean Book, Stamp and Handicraft Exhibition Opens in Russia 
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- An opening ceremony of the Korean book, stamp and handicraft exhibition took place at the History Museum in Dmitrov City, Moscow Region of Russia on September 8 to mark the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Hanging on the front wall of the venue of the exhibition was a photo of leader Kim Jong Il meeting with Russian President Putin.
					
					 On display there were works of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un, books introducing the DPRK and handicrafts associated with wisdom and talents of the Korean people.
					
					 The participants laid bouquets before the photo of Kim Jong Il and Putin and paid tribute to them.
					
					 The vice mayor of Dmitrov City warmly congratulated the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK, saying that the Korean people have made world-startling miracles in the building of a socialist power under the wise guidance of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The general manager of the History Museum of Dmitrov City said that the exhibition will help citizens get better understanding of the Korean people who have invariably covered the road of socialism, united close around the great leaders. He sincerely wished the DPRK wealth and prosperity.
					
					 The participants looked round the books, stamps and handicrafts on display.

articles.title: Korean People Supported by Nigerian Organization
articles.content:
Korean People Supported by Nigerian Organization
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted an article titled "DPRK conducts successful nuclear warhead explosion test" on its website on September 10.
					 The article said that scientists and technicians of the Nuclear Weapons Institute of the DPRK carried out a nuclear explosion test for the judgment of the power of nuclear warhead newly studied and manufactured by them under the plan of the Workers' Party of Korea for building a strategic nuclear force.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The standardization of the nuclear warhead will enable the DPRK to produce as many as it requires a variety of nuclear warheads of higher strike power.
					
					 The nuclear warhead explosion test is part of the substantial countermeasures to the threat and sanctions racket kicked up by the hostile forces including the U.S. who is persistently denying the strategic position of the DPRK as a full-fledged nuclear weapons state.
					
					 The DPRK fully demonstrated its toughest will to immediately counterattack the enemies if they make a provocation.
					
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism extends full support to the invariable efforts of the Korean people for developing the national power and achieving peace and reunification of the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: Presidente rumano expone voluntad de desarrollar relaciones de amistad con RPDC
articles.content:
Presidente rumano expone voluntad de desarrollar relaciones de amistad con RPDC
Pyongyang, 14 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El nuevo embajador coreano en Rumania, Ri Pyong Du, presento el dia 7 sus cartas credenciales ante el presidente rumano Klaus Iohannis.
					En la ocasion el mandatario rumano afirmo que su pais desarrollara las relaciones de amistad con la RPDC, que tienen larga historia, conforme a los intereses comunes de los pueblos de ambos paises.

articles.title: MINREX organiza encuentro informativo para diplomaticos de paises asiaticos
articles.content:
MINREX organiza encuentro informativo para diplomaticos de paises asiaticos
Pyongyang, 14 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea preparo hoy el encuentro informativo de la situacion para los representantes diplomaticos de los paises asiaticos, acreditados en la RPDC.
					En la ocasion tomaron parte los embajadores de Mongolia, Vietnam, Laos, Indonesia y la India y los encargados de negocios a.i. de Cambodia, Malasia, Iran y Pakistan. 
					
					Ante todo, el director de Asia y Oceania del MINREX, Choe Hui Chol, informo la posicion de principios de la RPDC en cuanto a la reciente prueba de explosion de ojiva nuclear. 
					
					Con esta prueba, se hizo posible producir comoquiera en cantidades necesarias las minimizadas, aligeradas y diversificadas ojivas nucleares de alto poder de ataque, senalo el y prosiguio que la brutal amenaza y chantaje nucleares de EE.UU. no dan otro resultado que el fortalecimiento constante de la capacidad de ataque nuclear de la RPDC.
					
					Prosiguio que en el futuro tambien, la RPDC nunca depondra el arma nuclear y proseguira el fortalecimiento cualitativo y cuantitativo de las fuerzas armadas nucleares del Estado para dar punto final a la politica hostil de EE.UU. contra la RPDC. 
					
					Puntualizo que los paises asiaticos deben conocer correctamente en que se reside la causa de la agravacion de tension de la Peninsula Coreana y mantener la imparcialidad y la neutralidad en el problema de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Seguidamente, se informo en detalles la magnitud de danos de inundaciones reportados en las zonas septentrionales de la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte.
					
					En acato al noble proposito del Mariscal Kim Jong Un de que no hay otro estado tan emergente que el dolor del pueblo ni la labor revolucionaria mas importante que eliminar las desgracias del pueblo, el Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el gobierno de la RPDC suspendieron totalmente la construccion de proyectos importantes como la avenida Ryomyong y movilizan en la campana de resarcimiento todas las potencialidades humanas, materiales y tecnicas, subrayo.   
					
					Llamo a los paises asiaticos, que tienen largas relaciones de amistad y cooperacion con la RPDC, a ofrecer la cooperacion activa en la reparacion de los danos de inundaciones ocurridos en las zonas septentrionales de la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte. 
					
					Este encuentro fue una oportunidad para que los representantes diplomaticos de los paises asiaticos, acreditados en la RPDC, tengan la comprension mas exacta sobre el hecho de que frente a la persistente politica de hostilidad y la amenaza nuclear de EE.UU. de varios decenios, la RPDC fortalece el disuasivo nuclear de autodefensa para defender su soberania y derechos a la subsistencia y al desarrollo. 
					
					Los representantes diplomaticos expresaron profunda compasion por las enormes perdidas humanas y materiales causadas por la riada en la RPDC y expresaron la voluntad de proponer a sus gobiernos ofrecer lo mas pronto posible la ayuda humanitaria emergente a la RPDC y hacer ingentes esfuerzos por el respecto.

articles.title: ACNC ridiculiza la locura conflictiva de traidora Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
ACNC ridiculiza la locura conflictiva de traidora Park Geun-hye 
Pyongyang, 14 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Se encuentra en la fase final la fiebre conflictiva de la traidora surcoreana Park Geun-hye que tiene el vicio de hablar mal de la parte connacional. 
					Hasta ahora cuando se acerca el fin de su vida politica, ella no se cansa de decir disparates como "serias senales de division" y "estado emergente de nivel preocupante" de alguien. 
					
					La camarilla de Park cayo en la peor crisis de dominacion por sus crimenes antipopulares y antinacionales cometidos durante su mandato. 
					
					Ella tomo el poder enganando a la poblacion con el cartel vistoso de "presidenta que atiende la vida del pueblo", pero incumplio mas de 200 promesas "electorales" causando el caos economico y la depauperacion de la vida del pueblo. 
					
					Como resultado, las "deudas estatales" del Sur de Corea llegan a un billon 170 mil millones de US$ y las otras empresariales y familiares, a un billon 180 mil millones de US$ y un billon 200 mil millones de US$, respectivamente. 
					
					El terrorismo politico contra las fuerzas democraticas pro-reunificacion y el secuestro a los moradores de la RPDC provocan gran rechazo y repudio de los coreanos y la sociedad internacional y declaran el arruinamiento politico y moral de la banda de Park Geun-hye, violadores de DDHH. 
					
					Enloquecidos por la confrontacion fratricida, ellos cerraron hasta la Zona Industrial de Kaesong, fruto de la era de reunificacion del 15 de junio y ultimo hilo de las relaciones intercoreanas. 
					
					Entregaron a EE.UU. el mando de operaciones para el tiempo de guerra e invalidaron el crimen de esclavitud sexual cometido en el siglo pasado por los imperialistas japoneses. Tales actos vendepatrias y serviles a grandes potencias adelantaron el fracaso total de su politica exterior. 
					
					Pese al unanime rechazo de la nacion y los paises regionales, aprobaron la ubicacion del sistema antimisiles norteamericano THAAD en el suelo surcoreano causando la avalancha de protestas y criticas. 
					
					Ahora la traidora Park esta muy inquietada por las fuerzas armadas nucleares de la RPDC que se consolidan cada dia mas frustrando la campana de aplastamiento de EE.UU. y pueden dar muerte a los titeres surcoreanos en un instante. 
					
					Los esfuerzos desesperados de ella por buscar la salida en las calumnias anti-RPDC adelantaran mas su muerte.

articles.title: Bombarderos estrategicos de EE.UU. aparecen de subito en el cielo surcoreano
articles.content:
Bombarderos estrategicos de EE.UU. aparecen de subito en el cielo surcoreano
Pyongyang, 14 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El imperialismo norteamericano actua temerariamente atemorizado por la noticia de la exitosa prueba nuclear de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Anuncio ya que introducira en la Peninsula Coreana gran numero de sus propiedades nucleares estrategicas, inclusive el portaaviones y bombardero estrategico. 
					
					Como medida de la primera etapa, despacho con emergencia el dia 13 al espacio aereo surcoreano dos bombarderos estrategicos nucleares tipo B-1B, emplazados en la base aerea Anderson de la isla Guam.
					
					EE.UU. lo describe como una "muestra del cumplimiento de la firme promesa de defensa" hecha a los titeres surcoreanos, en particular, como una "fuerte advertencia" a la RPDC.
					
					B-1B es un connotado medio mortifero que usa EE.UU. para el golpe preventivo nuclear en la guerra de agresion a ultramar.
					
					Ese pais anuncia con fanfarroneria que solo con B-1B puede ejecutar una guerra nuclear total.
					
					Ya es hecho conocido que el 6 de pasado agosto, EE.UU. ubico a los 10 anos ese medio en la isla Guam, base avanzada contra la RPDC.
					
					Bajo el pretexto de la justa prueba de explosion de ojiva nuclear de la RPDC, el imperio ejerce otra vez la amenaza y chantaje nuclear aun antes de que se calmara el clima belico causado por los ejercicios de guerra nuclear "Ulji Freedom Guardian". Este hecho demuestra a que grado llega su ambicion de agredir a la RPDC.
					
					Al describir como "actos provocativos y amenazantes" todas las medidas de autodefensa, tomadas por la RPDC para defender la soberania del pais y el derecho a la existencia de la nacion, trata de buscar la justificacion de su ambicion agresiva.
					
					Partiendo de esta intencion siniestra, sigue enviando sus bombarderos estrategicos nucleares al firmamento surcoreano acechando la oportunidad de ataque preventivo nuclear.
					
					En el mismo contexto, intenta despachar uno tras otro a la Peninsula Coreana y sus periferias sus medios estrategicos nucleares tales como portaaviones.
					
					Debido a la extremada fiebre provocativa de los belicistas norteamericanos, la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana se acerca cada vez mas a la fase de explosion.
					
					El Ejercito Popular de Corea, que cuenta con todos los medios de reaccion militar capaces de frustrar de un golpe cualquier acto agresivo y provocativo, mantiene aguda vigilancia sobre los aventureros movimientos militares del imperio.
					
					　EE.UU. debe actuar con prudencia.
